forecast.name: Today

forecast.name: Tonight

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms after 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 8pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 48. North northwest wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Scattered Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers between 2pm and 5pm, then scattered showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 68. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 56, with temperatures rising to around 60 overnight. West wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
